content:
I just stumbled across this PR in triage. It replaces the current script script/test.lean with calling the batteries test driver directly. Would somebody like to take a look?

  • the PR looks plausible to me (but I did not test this locally);
  • @Damiano Testa indicated approval and asked @Kim Morrison for feedback (five weeks ago)

Would somebody like to take a look at this bit of mathlib CI clean-up?
Having read through the relevant, this seems to be the correct thing to do
The only thing I couldn't figure out is where the name batteries/test comes from

It's this section of the Batteries lakefile.lean:

@[test_driver]
lean_exe test where
  srcDir := "scripts"
